::Zardus/DeathStorm::

DeathStorm turns, about to fire at Nemesis with the transformation blocker 
when the Alliance member's shots hit the device, exploding it in his hand. He 
yells in pain, taking out a rifle and firing it at Nemesis, rolling and 
coming to a crouch.

Zardus sits down in his beast mode, looking at the fight below with some 
amusement.
